tinytiger 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Download TIGER shapes for states

Source: R/state.R
tt_state.Rd

Download TIGER shapes for states

Usage

tt_state(year = 2021)

Arguments

year

Integer year. Required. Years < 2012 are not currently supported.

Value

sf data.frame

Examples

tt_state()
#> Simple feature collection with 56 features and 14 fields
#> Geometry type: MULTIPOLYGON
#> Dimension:     XY
